Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge of cloud concepts, core Azure services, plus Azure management and governance features and tools.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate fundamental AI concepts related to the development of software and services of Microsoft Azure to create AI solutions.

Courses.Title: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Demonstrate foundational knowledge on security, compliance, and identity concepts and related cloud-based Microsoft solutions.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in implementing and managing identity and access solutions using Microsoft Entra ID, including identity governance, authentication methods, Conditional Access, and access management for applications and resources.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Information Protection Administrator
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in planning and implementing information protection and data loss prevention with Microsoft Purview, including sensitivity labels, DLP policies, data lifecycle and records management, and eDiscovery/auditing capabilities.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Administrator
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in implementing, managing, and monitoring Azure environments, including identity, governance, storage, compute, virtual networking, and backup/recovery.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in designing Azure infrastructure solutions, including identity, governance, security, data storage, business continuity, and application architecture that meets business requirements.

Courses.Title: Designing and Implementing a Microsoft Azure AI Solution
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in building, managing, and deploying AI solutions on Azure, including computer vision, natural language processing, speech, conversational AI, and generative AI solutions with Azure AI services.

Courses.Title: Microsoft Azure Data Scientist Associate
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in applying data science and machine learning to implement and run ML workloads on Azure, including model training, evaluation, deployment, and MLOps using Azure Machine Learning.

Courses.Title: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
Courses.Description: Demonstrate skills in implementing DevOps practices for planning, source control, CI/CD, infrastructure as code, dependency management, security, compliance, monitoring, and continuous feedback using Azure DevOps and GitHub.
